title: Pre-Service Teacher Education with Generative AI: Peer Assessment and ChatGPT-Integrated Science Lesson Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Science Curriculum Content, Foundational Knowledge of Concept Mapping, and Basic Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric learning environment with weekly modular online assignments

learning_goals: Learners can generate science curriculum materials based on concept maps using ChatGPT three or more times.
Learners can improve generated instructional materials two or more times by incorporating peer assessment feedback.
Learners can explain step-by-step a science lesson design process that integrates concept maps with generative AI.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
